author: Nick Ackerman
text: iPhone 12 Pro Max vs Galaxy S23 Ultra Speed Test! Let's find out how Apple's 2020 Flagship stacks up to Samsung's 2023 Beast! Share your thoughts, questions, and comments, and enjoy the speed test!

text: I upgraded from the 12 Pro Max to the 13 Pro Max and then got bored with Apple and then went to the s23 Ultra... I love my Ultra.... very quick and snappy.... the camera absolutely amazing... author: José Adorno

author: mikldude
text:
I have the 12 pro max and 14 pro max and a couple of older galaxys , looking at the differences between the 12 and 14 models ,in general day to day use and general performance , i find much as you have shown here Nick , my old 12 pro max still performs like a beauty , and in my own speed test tests between the two , the difference more often than not for general use was imo very small , and i usually have 4 phones a macbook and ipad at my side , and when it comes to the iphones , im just as happy to pick up the 12 pro max as the newer 14 pro max , and i still prefer the notch to the island ..... just personal preference , but i do always carry the 14 whne i go somewhere , and when outside in the sun or in bright day light , the slightly more bright screen of the 14 pro max is a bit of a luxury on the eyes , although the 12 was still quite decent .
Given i dont game on phones , and really dont run them at the limit , i probably could have saved some coin and just stayed with the old fathful 12 PM ...... but wheres the fun in that :) .
